require 'benchmark'

Benchmark.bm do|b|
  b.report("if-else") do
    time = nil
    1000000000.times do
    if time
      @expires_in = Time.now
    else
      @expires_in = nil
     end
   end
  end

  b.report("ternary") do
    time = nil
    1000000000.times do
     @expires_in = time ? Time.now : nil
    end
  end
end
